    <facet>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4018</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Making a Video Microscope System</string>
            <string language="es">Creación de un sistema de videomicroscopio</string>
            <string language="ga">Córas Micreascóp Físe a Dhéanamh</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden eines videomikroskop-Systems</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fabrication d'un système visuel de microscope</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fazendo um sistema video do microscópio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare un video sistema del microscopio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή ενός τηλεοπτικού συστήματος μικροσκοπίων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Instructions for making an adapter for a home video camera so that it can be used with a microscope in a school laboratory.</string>
            <string language="es">Instrucciones para hacer un adaptador para un video cámara casera con el fin de utilizarla con un microscopio en un laboratorio de colegio.</string>
            <string language="ga">Treoracha chun cuibheoir d’fhíscheamara baile a dhéanamh le gur féidir é a úsáid le micreascóp i saotharlann na scoile.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencia</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">AnimalPlant Biology</string>
            <string language="es">Biología</string>
            <string language="ga">Bitheolaíocht Ainmhithe Plandaí</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Animales y plantas</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen für das Bilden eines Adapters für 
eine Hauptvideokamera, damit sie mit einem Mikroskop in einem 
Schulelabor benutzt werden kann.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions pour faire un adaptateur pour un 
appareil-photo visuel à la maison de sorte qu'il puisse être 
utilisé avec un microscope dans un laboratoire d'école.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções para fazer um adaptador para uma 
câmera video home de modo que possa ser usada com um microscópio em 
um laboratório da escola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni per fare un adattatore per una video 
macchina fotografica domestica in moda da poterla usare esso con un 
microscopio in un laboratorio della scuola.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγίες για την κατασκευή ενός προσαρμοστή για μια 
βασική τηλεοπτική φωτογραφική μηχανή έτσι ώστε μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί με ένα μικροσκόπιο σε ένα σχολικό εργαστήριο.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">AnimalPlant Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
